server.model.players.combat.range

Class CannonCoords

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.players.combat.range.CannonCoords

  • public class CannonCoords
extends java.lang.Object
    For this to work and to be able to find all the npcs around within a 12 tile distance, and find the npcs when the cannon is facing their way, we are going to preload all the coords into this map to be grabbed later on to check if any npcs are around.
    Author:
    Rodrigo Molina
